Added elevator door windows (iron, oak, spruce, birch, jungle, acacia, dark oak, crimson, and warped). 
Added copper frquency selector item. 
Added recipes for (button blocks, elevator door, elevator door frame, elevator stop). 
Elevators now travel directly to the floor when the call button is pressed.
